collection:
This Privacy Policy explains
how your personal information is collected, used, and disclosed by Humbot.

## Overview

This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect, how we use it and
why we may process it.
* Usage Data is a reference to the data automatically collected by either the usage of the service or the infrastructure of the service itself.

When you visit our website, register on our site, place an order, subscribe to
our newsletter, or respond to a survey or form, we collect information from
you.

This information includes IP addresses, e-mail addresses, browser type,
Internet service provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, Email addressName.

We only use the email
address that you give us to contact you.
sharing:
This Privacy Policy explains
how your personal information is collected, used, and disclosed by Humbot.

It refers to third parties or people employed by the enterprise in the facilitation of the service, in delivering the service on behalf of the enterprise, in the performance of services related to the service or in assisting the enterprise in the analysis of how that service is used.
